attributes.action: Make it illegal for Andrew McIntosh to replace his existing sofa with a new less comfy one!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned  do hereby petition Gordon Brown to make replacing Andrew McIntosh`s three piece suite a capital offence.This is a matter of National Security and must not be treated lightly.As a former Communist,Mr McIntosh has created a dictatorship in his lavish residence and will not submit to increasing pressure to allow the much loved furniture to continue to provide a comfortable resting place for road weary travellers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
